goals.active: Reforge and use a true Dragonsblood Spear.
goals.complete: I met Zafirah in the field. She had brought her Dragonsblood Spear and two Zephyrites. With their help, I reforged the spear, this time using Kralkatorrik's blood.

goals.active: Take your reforged Dragonsblood Spear to Kralkatorrik.
goals.complete: It was time to test the spear on Kralkatorrik. I found a vulnerable place and sank the spear deep. He roared with pain.

goals.active: Travel into the cave network under the island.
goals.complete: Despite our efforts, Kralkatorrik continued to heal. Taimi suggested he was feeding from underground ley lines. Gorrik confirmed the existence of a network of caves beneath Kralkatorrik. We headed in.
